originContent: The model uses Mel spectrogram frames as encoder input, with one frame per input position. The model decoder output at each step is a softmax distribution over a discrete, predefined, vocabulary of events. Outputs are sparse, events are only needed when a hit-object occurs, instead of annotating every single audio frame.
